Urethritis or cervicitis: treatment of probabilistic gonococcal and chlamydial infection

- Ceftriaxone single dose IM or IV 1000 mg

- Doxycycline 200 mg PO 7 days (or azithromycin 1g single dose)

properties.question: What is the recommended treatment for a patient with probable gonococcal and chlamydial infection presenting with urethritis or cervicitis?
properties.option_a: Ceftriaxone 500 mg IM or IV once
properties.option_b: Ceftriaxone 1000 mg IM or IV once
properties.option_c: Doxycycline 100 mg PO twice daily for 7 days
